steps.name: 默认会话
steps.comment: 在重编程过程中，首先需要发送$10 01的物理寻址消息，请求使目的ECU进入默认会话模式。
steps.comment_en:
During the reprogramming process, the physical addressing message of $10 01 needs to be sent first to 
request the target ECU to enter the default session mode.

steps.name: 扩展模式
steps.comment:
在重编程过程中，首先需要发送$10 83的功能寻址消息，请求使网络中所有ECU进入扩展会话
模式。Tester发送完此报文后，需要延时1秒再执行后续步骤。
steps.comment_en:
During the reprogramming process, a functional addressing message of $10 83 needs to be sent first to 
request all ECUs in the network to enter the extended session mode. After sending the message, the 
Tester waits for 1s and then performs the subsequent operations.

steps.name: 关闭DTC记录
steps.comment: Tester使用此服务禁用所有ECU的DTC设置，以确保所有ECU在重编程过程中不会记录DTC。
steps.comment_en:
The Tester uses this message to disable DTC settings of all ECUs to ensure that all ECUs do not record 
DTCs during reprogramming.

steps.name: 禁止通讯
steps.comment: Tester使用此服务禁用所有ECU的网络管理报文和通用报文的发送和接收。
steps.comment_en:
The Tester uses this message to disable DTC settings of all ECUs to ensure that all ECUs do not record 
DTCs during reprogramming.

steps.name: 读当前运行分区信息
steps.comment:
。Tester根据读取到的
当前运行分区信息，选择对应的版本文件进行刷写。如果ECU返回A，Tester将选择B版本文
件进行刷写，如果ECU返回B，Tester将选择A版本文件进行刷写。如果ECU不支持此步骤，返回NRC 31表示不支持此DID，Tester取通用版本文件进行刷写，
否则应该取对应的A或者B区的版本文件进行刷写。
steps.comment_en:
The Tester needs to select the corresponding version file for program
ming based on the read information about the current running partition. If the ECU returns version A, 
the Tester will select version B file for programming. If the ECU returns version B, the Tester will select 
version A file for programming.If the ECU does not support this operation or DID, NRC 31 is returned. In this case, the Tester uses the 
general version file for programming. Otherwise, the Tester uses the version file in partition A or B for 
programming.

steps.name: BOOT软件版本
steps.comment: Boot软件版本识别
steps.comment_en: Boot software identification

steps.name: ECU软件版本
steps.comment: ECU软件版本信息
steps.comment_en: Vehicle Manufacturer ECU Software Version Number

steps.name: ECU硬件版本
steps.comment: ECU硬件版本信息
steps.comment_en: Vehicle Manufacturer ECU Hardware Version Number

steps.name: 编程条件检查
steps.comment: 检查编程条件是否满足
steps.comment_en: Check programming conditions

steps.name: 编程会话
steps.comment: 进入编程会话
steps.comment_en: Enter programming session

steps.name: 请求种子
steps.comment: 请求安全种子
steps.comment_en: Request security seed

steps.name: 发送密钥
steps.comment: 发送计算后的密钥
steps.comment_en: Send calculated key

steps.name: 读当前运行分区信息
steps.comment:
。Tester根据读取到的
当前运行分区信息，选择对应的版本文件进行刷写。如果ECU返回A，Tester将选择B版本文
件进行刷写，如果ECU返回B，Tester将选择A版本文件进行刷写。如果ECU不支持此步骤，返回NRC 31表示不支持此DID，Tester取通用版本文件进行刷写，
否则应该取对应的A或者B区的版本文件进行刷写。
steps.comment_en:
The Tester needs to select the corresponding version file for program
ming based on the read information about the current running partition. If the ECU returns version A, 
the Tester will select version B file for programming. If the ECU returns version B, the Tester will select 
version A file for programming.If the ECU does not support this operation or DID, NRC 31 is returned. In this case, the Tester uses the 
general version file for programming. Otherwise, the Tester uses the version file in partition A or B for 
programming.

steps.name: 写入指纹
steps.comment:
软件指纹信息，包含了修改软件的时间，以及谁修改了软件等相关信息，通过$2E F184 写入
Flash 中保存。ECU需要维护一个尝试编程次数的计数器 (DID= 0xF0F1) ，在正响应返回之前，
此计数器加1，此计数值应该持久保存。如果编程次数超过ECU最大尝试编程次数（设置为0
时，不限制尝试编程次数，默认为0），ECU应该返回NRC22。
steps.comment_en:
Software fingerprint information, including software modification time and "modified by". The infor
mation is written to the flash through $2E F184. The ECU needs to maintain a counter for the number 
of programming attempts. Before a positive response is returned, the counter value is incremented by 
one for each attempt, and should be stored persistently. If the number of programming attempts exceeds 
the set value, the ECU returns NRC22. If the set value is 0, the number of programming attempts is not 
limited. The default value is 0.

steps.name: 擦除存储器
steps.comment:
Tesrer通过发送此例程控制服务进行擦除Flash操作，在4.3.5写入指纹步骤执行成功并成功把
指纹信息写入Flash后才允许进行Flash的擦除操作。文件如果压缩， MemorySize使用未压缩
的值。
steps.comment_en:
The Tester sends this routine control message to erase the flash. The flash erasing operation can be 
executed only after the operation of writing fingerprints successfully into the flash in section 4.3.5. If 
the file is compressed, MemorySize uses an uncompressed value.

steps.name: 请求下载
steps.comment:
Tester使用此请求向ECU请求将在TransferData $36服务中编程的数据的起始地址和内存大小。
内存位置地址应从RequestDownload指定的起始地址开始连续。
steps.comment_en:
The Tester sends this message to request the ECU to provide the start address and memory size of data 
to be programmed in the TransferData $36 service. The memory address must be consecutive from the 
start address specified by the RequestDownload service.

steps.name: 传输数据
steps.comment:
Tester 使用此服务将编程的数据传输到 ECU。参数 BlockSequenceCounter 用作块计数器，以确
保Blocks 正确的被传输。BlockSequenceCounter从 1开始，依次累加，当累加到 FFh时，下次
从0开始。传输过程中Tester可能会重传36消息，ECU需要根据ISO 14229的要求正确处理这
种场景的消息传输。为了防止$36消息无限循环，建议ECU内部对BlockSequenceCounter重置
次数计数，达到一定次数后，返回NRC 73的否定响应。
steps.comment_en:
The Tester uses this message to transmit programmed data to the ECU. The BlockSequenceCounter 
parameter is used as a block counter to ensure that blocks are correctly transmitted. The value of the 
BlockSequenceCounter parameter starts from and increases by one. When the value reaches FFh, it 
starts from 0 next time. During the transmission, the Tester may retransmit the $36 message. The ECU 
needs to correctly process the message transmission in this scenario according to the ISO 14229 standard. 
To prevent infinite transmission of the $36 message, the ECU counts the number of times that the 
BlockSequenceCounter parameter is reset. When the number of times reaches the specified value, the 
negative response message of NRC 73 is returned.

steps.name: 请求退出下载
steps.comment:
Tester 发送此服务使ECU退出当前软件段编程。 
如果还有软件段要刷新，Tester 将为下一个要编程的连续软件段启动请求下载、传输数据和请
求退出下载的流程。
steps.comment_en:
The Tester sends this message to enable the ECU to exit the current segment programming. 
If there are still segments to be refreshed, the Tester initiates the process of requesting to download files, 
transmitting data, and requesting to exit downloading mode for the next continuous segment to be pro
grammed.

steps.name: 安全签名校验
steps.comment:
当一个文件中的所有软件段全部传输完毕后，通过例程控制触发 ECU 内部进行安全签名的校
验。如果 ECU 验证安全签名成功，则此例程返回成功，ECU将给出验证成功的肯定响应消息
（驱动文件需要激活驱动）。否则，将发送安全签名校验失败的肯定响应消息。当Tester收到
此消息的校验失败的肯定响应消息或者NRC否定响应时，Tester将终止重编程流程。
steps.comment_en:
After all segments in a file are transmitted, this routine control service is used to trigger the ECU to 
verify the security signature. If the ECU successfully verifies the security signature, a success message 
is returned, and the ECU returns a positive response message indicating that the verification is successful 
(the driver file needs to be activated). Otherwise, a positive response message indicating that the security 
signature verification fails is sent. When the Tester receives a positive response indicating that the ver
ification fails or a negative response message of NRC, the Tester terminates the reprogramming process.

steps.name: 阻止自动切区
steps.comment: 阻止切区动作
steps.comment_en: automatic partition switchover prevention

steps.name: 检查编程依赖关系
steps.comment:
当ECU的所有应用程序软件/数据都已全部下载完毕，发送此消息，触发ECU进行编程依赖关
系检查。
steps.comment_en:
The RoutineControl $31 01 FF01 message is sent to trigger the ECU to check the programming depend
encies when software and data of all applications in the ECU is downloaded.

steps.name: 开始安装版本
steps.comment:
此步骤用于启动ECU的版本安装流程，为可选步骤，智能部件必须支持此步骤，非智能部件
不支持此步骤。ECU需要先把需要安装版本区域的程序设置为无效，再启动安装，防止安装过
程没有成功而程序意外执行应用程序。一旦启动ECU版本安装，不支持调用停止安装，请等
待ECU成功完成安装、安装失败或者安装超时。
steps.comment_en:
This operation is used to start the ECU version installation process. This operation must be supported 
by intelligent components, not supported for non-intelligent components. ECU needs to set the program 
in the partition where the version needs to be installed to invalid before starting the installation. This 
prevents the application from being executed accidentally when the installation fails. Once the ECU 
version installation is started, the ECU cannot be called to stop version installation. Wait until the ECU 
version installation is successful or fails, or the installation timeout occurs.

steps.name: 获取安装进度和结果
steps.comment:
Tester 应该以 1 秒的周期调用此服务，获取安装进度和结果。此步骤为可选步骤，智能部件必
须支持此步骤，非智能部件不支持此步骤。ECU超时未响应此消息，Tester 不能当做错误处理，
应该继续查询，直到获取到成功并且进度 100%或者 ECU 响应安装或校验失败。此过程中
Tester 如果检测 DoIP 链路断开，Tester 应该做链路重连，直到获取安装成功或者安装失败。
ECU可能由于故障原因一直无法完成安装，此步骤应该设置超时时间，超时时间T2=30分钟没
有完成或者结束，Tester应该终止本次重编程流程。在编程序列的安装进度获取中，FileInstallStatus 字段应该只允许响应 00h/01h/02h/04h，不允许响应
03h/05h。
steps.comment_en:
The Tester should send this message at an interval of 1s to obtain the installation progress and results. 
This operation must be supported by intelligent components, not supported for non-intelligent compo
nents. If the ECU does not respond to this message within the specified period, the Tester cannot regard 
it as an error and should continue to query until the query is successful and the installation progress 
reaches 100% or the ECU responds that the installation verification fails. During this process, after 
detecting that the DoIP link is disconnected, the Tester should reconnect the link until the results that 
the installation succeeds or fails are obtained. The ECU version may fail to be installed due to faults. In 
this operation, a timeout period should be set. If the installation is not complete or ends within 30 minutes 
(timeout period T2), the Tester should terminate the reprogramming process. For the response during the installation progress obtaining of the programming step, the value of the 
FileInstallStatus field can only be 00h, 01h, 02h and 04h.

steps.name: 开启通讯
steps.comment: 发送此服务恢复所有ECU的网络管理报文和通用报文的发送和接收。
steps.comment_en:
This message is sent to restore the transmission and reception of network management and general mes
sages for all ECUs.

steps.name: ECU复位
steps.comment:
发送此服务将使ECU重启，并生效下载的应用软件/数据。ECU在收到此消息复位前，应该主
动关闭和清理DoIP链路。Tester在发送完此命令后，需要等待1秒，再执行后续步骤。ECU的硬复位，指ECU按照上电/启动顺序执行特定的初始化操作，不强制ECU进行掉电复
位。
steps.comment_en:
Sending this message will restart the ECU and make the downloaded application software or data take 
effect. After receiving this message, the ECU actively disables and clears the DOIP link before resetting. 
After sending the message, the Tester waits for 1s and them performs the subsequent operations. The ECU performs specific initialization operations according to the power-on and startup sequence to 
implement hard reset. The ECU is not forced to perform a power-off reset.

steps.name: 获取安装进度和结果
steps.comment:
此步骤为可选步骤，智能部件必须支持此步骤，非智能部件不支持此步骤。智能部件完成版本
安装并重启后，运行在新版本后可能需要查询内部安装和校验的信息才能确认本次升级是否成
功，如 ECU 的私有部件的升级结果，失败原因，故障码等，在后编程序列的激活进度获取中， 
FileActiveStatus 字段应该只允许响应 00h/01h/03h/05h，不允许响应 02h/04h。
steps.comment_en:
(Optional). This operation must be supported by intelligent components, not supported for non-intelli
gent components. After an intelligent component completes version installation and restarts, the Tester 
may need to query the internal installation and verification information to check whether the update is 
successful. The information includes the update results, failure cause, and error code of the ECU pro
prietary components. For the response during the installation progress obtaining of the post-program
ming step, the value of the FileActiveStatus field can only be 00h, 01h, 03h and 05h.

steps.name: 扩展会话
steps.comment: 发送$10 03的物理寻址消息，请求目的ECU进入扩展会话模式。
steps.comment_en:
The Tester sends the physical addressing message of $10 03 to request the target ECU to enter the 
extended session mode.

steps.name: 清除所有故障码
steps.comment: Tester使用物理寻址清除目的ECU的故障码。
steps.comment_en: The Tester clears DTCs of the target ECU by using the physical addressing message.

steps.name: 开启DTC记录
steps.comment: Tester使用此服务使能所有ECU的DTC设置，启动所有ECU的设置DTC功能。
steps.comment_en: The Tester uses this message to enable the DTC setting of all ECUs.

steps.name: 默认会话
steps.comment:
Tester将发送此消息使所有ECU启动默认会话模式。回到默认会话后，ECU会自动打开通讯，
使能故障码。
steps.comment_en:
The Tester will send this message to make all ECUs start the default session mode. After returning to 
the default session mode, the ECU automatically enables the communication and DTCs.
